Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-07-13T16:05:26.474951-04:00.

body.ab: <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C25"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16243"/> <metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16243"/> At Cologne we descended <lb n="c57-0090__main__18"/>to the plains of Holland& we resolved to <lb n="c57-0090__main__19"/>post the remainder of our wayfor <lb n="c57-0090__main__20"/>the wind was contrary& the stream of <lb n="c57-0090__main__21"/>the river was too gentle to aid us. We now <lb n="c57-0090__main__22"/>arrived at very different country. The <lb n="c57-0090__main__23"/>soil was sandy and the wheels sunk deep <lb n="c57-0090__main__24"/>in it. The towns of th <mod sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16264"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16268"/>is <sga-add eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16268"/> <mod eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16264"/> country are the <lb n="c57-0090__main__25"/>most pleasing part of the scene. The <lb n="c57-0090__main__26"/>Dutch are extremely neat but there is <lb n="c57-0090__main__27"/>an awkwardness in their contrivances <lb n="c57-0090__main__28"/>that often surprised us. In one place, <lb n="c57-0090__main__29"/>I remember, a wind mill was <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0090__main__d4e16283">placed</del> <lb n="c57-0090__main__30"/>situated in such a manner that the <lb n="c57-0090__main__31"/>postillion was obliged to guide the <w ana="start"/>car<lb n="c57-0090__main__32"/>riage<w ana="end"/> close to the opposite side of the <lb n="c57-0090__main__33"/>road to escape from the sweep of its <lb n="c57-0090__main__34"/>sails. The way often led between two <w ana="start"/>ca<lb n="c57-0090__main__35"/>nals<w ana="end"/> where the road was only broard<zone eID="c57-0090__main"/> <surface eID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0090"/> <surface lrx="5138" lry="7032" partOf="#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="46r" shelfmark="MS. Abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091" sID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0091.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sID="c57-0091__main"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__1"/>enough to allow one carriage to pass <lb n="c57-0091__main__2"/>and when we met another vehicle <lb n="c57-0091__main__3"/>which was frequently the case we were <lb n="c57-0091__main__4"/>rolled back sometimes for nearly a <lb n="c57-0091__main__5"/>mile untill we found one of the <lb n="c57-0091__main__6"/>drawbridges which led to the fields, down <lb n="c57-0091__main__7"/>on which one carriage remained <lb n="c57-0091__main__8"/>while the other <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16334">carriage</del> passed <lb n="c57-0091__main__9"/>on. They soak their flax also in the <lb n="c57-0091__main__10"/>mud of their canals and place it <lb n="c57-0091__main__11"/>against the trees along the road side <lb n="c57-0091__main__12"/>to dry. When the sun is hot the <lb n="c57-0091__main__13"/>scent <mod sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16348"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16350">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16353"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16353"/> <mod eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16348"/> this exhales is not very <lb n="c57-0091__main__14"/>easily endured. Yet the roads are <lb n="c57-0091__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16362">good</del> excellent & the verdure beautiful<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/><lb n="c57-0091__main__16"/>From Rotterdamwe went<lb n="c57-0091__main__17"/>by sea to England. It was on a clear <lb n="c57-0091__main__18"/>morningin the latter <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16373"/>days <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16373"/>of September<lb n="c57-0091__main__19"/>that I first saw the white cliffs of <lb n="c57-0091__main__20"/>Britain. The banks <mod sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16381"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16383"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16383"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16389"/>of the<sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16389"/><mod eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16381"/>Thames presented <lb n="c57-0091__main__21"/>a new scene; they were flatbut fertile <lb n="c57-0091__main__22"/> & almost every town was marked by <lb n="c57-0091__main__23"/>some story. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16400">Th</del>We saw Tilbury Fort &<lb n="c57-0091__main__24"/>rememberedthe Spanish Armada; <lb n="c57-0091__main__25"/>Gravesend, Woolwich, Greenwichplaces <lb n="c57-0091__main__26"/>which I had heard of even in my <lb n="c57-0091__main__27"/>country. At length we saw the <w ana="start"/>nume<lb n="c57-0091__main__28"/>rous<w ana="end"/> steeples of London; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16418">&</del> St Pauls <lb n="c57-0091__main__29"/>towereringabove all& the Tower famed <lb n="c57-0091__main__30"/>in English History. <lb n="c57-0092__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0092.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16439">11</del> 2. <anchor xml:id="c57-0092.02"/><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__2"/>Londonwas <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16449">the</del> our present point <lb n="c57-0092__main__3"/>of rest; we determined to remain several <lb n="c57-0092__main__4"/>months in this wonderful & celebrated city. <lb n="c57-0092__main__5"/>Cl <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16458"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16462"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16462"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16468"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16468"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16458"/> rval <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16473"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16475">wished</del><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16478"/>desired <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16478"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16473"/> for the intercourse of <lb n="c57-0092__main__6"/>the men of genius & talent who <w ana="start"/>flou<lb n="c57-0092__main__7"/>rished<w ana="end"/> at thattime; but this was,with <lb n="c57-0092__main__8"/>me,a secondary <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16493"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16495">consideration</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16498"/>object <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16498"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16493"/> ;I was <w ana="start"/>princi<lb n="c57-0092__main__9"/>pally<w ana="end"/> occupied with the means of obtaining <lb n="c57-0092__main__10"/>the information necessary for the <w ana="start"/>comple<lb n="c57-0092__main__11"/>tion<w ana="end"/> of my promiseand quickly availed <lb n="c57-0092__main__12"/>myself of the letters of introduction that <lb n="c57-0092__main__13"/>I had brought with meaddressed to <lb n="c57-0092__main__14"/>the <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16523"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16525">various</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16528"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16528"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16534"/>most <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16534"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16537">men of sci</del> <mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16523"/> distinguished <lb n="c57-0092__main__15"/>natural philosophers.If this journey had <lb n="c57-0092__main__16"/>taken place during my days of study &<lb n="c57-0092__main__17"/>happinessit would have afforded me <lb n="c57-0092__main__18"/>inexpressible <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16550">delight</del> pleasure. But a <lb n="c57-0092__main__19"/>blight had come over my existence& I only <lb n="c57-0092__main__20"/>visited these people for the sake of the <lb n="c57-0092__main__21"/>information they might give <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16560">d</del> me on <lb n="c57-0092__main__22"/>the subject in which Iwas so deeply <lb n="c57-0092__main__23"/>interrested.Company was ir <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16567"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16574"/>k <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16574"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16567"/> someto me; <lb n="c57-0092__main__24"/>when aloneI could fill my mind with the <lb n="c57-0092__main__25"/>sights of heaven & earth; the voice of <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16583">He</del> <lb n="c57-0092__main__26"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0092.01"/><lb n="c57-0092__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0092__left_margin__d4e16597"/>Henry <sga-add eID="c57-0092__left_margin__d4e16597"/>soothed me& I could cheat myself into a<lb n="c57-0092__main__27"/>transitorypeace. But busy, uninterresting,<lb n="c57-0092__main__28"/>joyousfaces brought back despair to my<lb n="c57-0092__main__29"/>heart.I saw an insurmountable barrie<lb n="c57-0092__main__30"/>placedbetween me & my fellow men; thi<lb n="c57-0092__main__31"/>barrierwas sealed with the blood of<lb n="c57-0092__main__32"/>Williamand Justine,and to reflect on<lb n="c57-0092__main__33"/>thoseevents filled my soul with anguish<lb n="c57-0092__main__34"/>But in Cl <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16634"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16638"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16638"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16634"/> rvalI saw the image of my <lb n="c57-0092__main__35"/>former self; he was inquisitive& anxious <lb n="c57-0093__main__1"/>to gain experience & instruction;The <lb n="c57-0093__main__2"/>difference of manners <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16657"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16659">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16662"/>which<sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16662"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16657"/>he observed <lb n="c57-0093__main__3"/>was to him <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16668">&</del> an inexhaustible source of <lb n="c57-0093__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0093.01"/><lb n="c57-0093__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16680"/> observation & <sga-add eID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16680"/> <zone eID="c57-0093__left_margin"/> amusement. He was for ever busy& the <lb n="c57-0093__main__5"/>only check to his enjoyments was my <w ana="start"/>sor<lb n="c57-0093__main__6"/>rowful<w ana="end"/>&dejected m <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16692"/> <mdel>ei</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16696"/>ie <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16696"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16692"/> n.I tried to conceal <lb n="c57-0093__main__7"/>this as much as possiblethat I might not <lb n="c57-0093__main__8"/>debar him from the pleasures natural <lb n="c57-0093__main__9"/>to onewho was entering on a new scene <lb n="c57-0093__main__10"/>of life, undisturbed by any care or <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16709"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16711"/>the <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16711"/> </del> <w ana="start"/>bitter<lb n="c57-0093__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0093.02"/><lb n="c57-0093__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16725"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16727"/>ness<w ana="end"/> of <sga-add eID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16727"/> </del> recollection. I often refused to accompany <lb n="c57-0093__main__12"/>him alledginganother engagementthat <lb n="c57-0093__main__13"/>I might remain a alone;I now also <lb n="c57-0093__main__14"/>began to collect the materials necessary <lb n="c57-0093__main__15"/>for my <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16743">work</del> new creation& this was <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16746">a</del> to <lb n="c57-0093__main__16"/>me like the torture of single drops of <lb n="c57-0093__main__17"/>water continually falling on the head;<lb n="c57-0093__main__18"/>Every thought that was devoted to it <lb n="c57-0093__main__19"/>was <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16758">th</del> an extreme anguish, and every <lb n="c57-0093__main__20"/>word that I spoke in allusion to it caused <lb n="c57-0093__main__21"/>my lips to quiver& my heart to palpitate <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16766"/>. <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16766"/><lb n="c57-0093__main__22"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16771">in a most painful degre</del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16774">e.</del><milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__23"/>After passing some months in <lb n="c57-0093__main__24"/>Londonwe received a letter from a <lb n="c57-0093__main__25"/>person in Scotlandwho had formerly <lb n="c57-0093__main__26"/>been <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16788">an</del> our visitorat Geneva. He <lb n="c57-0093__main__27"/>mentioned the beauties of his native <w ana="start"/>coun<lb n="c57-0093__main__28"/>try<w ana="end"/>&asked us if those were not sufficient <lb n="c57-0093__main__29"/>allurements to induce us to prolong our <lb n="c57-0093__main__30"/>journey as far <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16804">noth</del> north as Perth<lb n="c57-0093__main__31"/>where he resided. Cl <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16810"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16814"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16814"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16820"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16820"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16810"/> rvaleagerly desired <lb n="c57-0093__main__32"/>to accept this invitation,and I, although <lb n="c57-0093__main__33"/>I abhorred society, wished to view again <lb n="c57-0093__main__34"/>mountains & streams& all the <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16830">the</del> wondrous <lb n="c57-0093__main__35"/>works ofnature inher chosen dwelling places<lb n="c57-0094__main__1"/>We had arrived in Englan <mod sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16845"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16849"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16849"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16855"/>at <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16855"/><mod eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16845"/>the beginning <lb n="c57-0094__main__2"/>of Octoberand it was now february;we <w ana="start"/>according<lb n="c57-0094__main__3"/>ly<w ana="end"/> determined to commence our journey <lb n="c57-0094__main__4"/>towards the north at <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0094__main__d4e16870">ex</del> at the expiration of <lb n="c57-0094__main__5"/>another month. In this expedition we did <lb n="c57-0094__main__6"/>not intend to follow the great road to Edinburgh<lb n="c57-0094__main__7"/>But to visit Windsor, Oxford, Matlock& the <lb n="c57-0094__main__8"/>Cumberland lakesresolving to arrive at the <lb n="c57-0094__main__9"/>completion of this tour about the end of <lb n="c57-0094__main__10"/>July. I packed my chemical instruments<lb n="c57-0094__main__11"/>& the materials which I had collected<w ana="start"/>resolv<lb n="c57-0094__main__12"/>ing<w ana="end"/> to finish my labours in some obscure <lb n="c57-0094__main__13"/>nook in the country.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0094__main__14"/>We quitted London on the 27of <lb n="c57-0094__main__15"/>Marchand remain <mod sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16903"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16905"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16905"/><sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16911"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16911"/><mod eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16903"/> da few days at Windsor<lb n="c57-0094__main__16"/>rambling in its beautiful forest. This was <lb n="c57-0094__main__17"/>a new scene to us mountaineers; The <del next="#c57-0094.02" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0094__main__d4e16920">beauti</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16923"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16923"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16929"/>majectic <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16929"/><lb n="c57-0094__main__18"/> <del xml:id="c57-0094__main__d4e16935">ful</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0094.01"/> oaksthe quantity of game& the <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0094.03"/><w ana="start"/>beau<lb n="c57-0094__main__19"/>tiful<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c57-0094.03"/> flock <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16951"/>s <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16951"/>of <mod sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16954"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0094__main__d4e16956">beautiful</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0094__main__d4e16959"/>lovely <sga-add eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16959"/><mod eID="c57-0094__main__d4e16954"/> deerwere all novelties <lb n="c57-0094__main__20"/>to us. From thence we proceeded to Oxford. <lb n="c57-0094__main__21"/>We were charmedwith the appearance<lb n="c57-0094__main__22"/>of the town. The colledges are antient and <lb n="c57-0094__main__23"/>picturesque, the streets broard& the <w ana="start"/>lands<lb n="c57-0094__main__24"/>cape<w ana="end"/> rendered perfect by the lovely Isis.<lb n="c57-0094__main__25"/>which <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0094__main__d4e16983">near here</del> spreads into broard &<lb n="c57-0094__main__26"/>placid expance of water & runs south <lb n="c57-0094__main__27"/>ofthe town. We found thatthe <lb n="c57-0094__main__30"/>regulationsof this university were much <lb n="c57-0094__main__31"/>improved sincethe days of Gibbon; But <lb n="c57-0094__main__32"/>there is still <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0094__main__d4e17032"> <unclear>pr</unclear> </del> in fashiona great deal<lb n="c57-0094__main__33"/>of bigotry & devotion to established rules that <lb n="c57-0094__main__34"/>constrainsthe mindof the students & leads <lb n="c57-0094__main__35"/>to slavish& narrow principles of action. <lb n="c57-0095__main__1"/>Many enormities are also practised which <lb n="c57-0095__main__2"/>although they might excitethe laughter<lb n="c57-0095__main__3"/>of a stranger were looked uponin the <lb n="c57-0095__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0095.01"/><lb n="c57-0095__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0095__left_margin__d4e17066"/>world ofthe <sga-add eID="c57-0095__left_margin__d4e17066"/>university as matters ofthe utmost <lb n="c57-0095__main__5"/>consequence.
